languages.text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by this creature curses the targets, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against them.
Cursed targets also gain a guaranteed critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} on their next attack.

traits.locale_text:
Any damage inflicted by this creature curses the targets, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit{/g} chance against them.
Cursed targets also gain a guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit{/g} on their next attack.

Any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by this creature curses the targets, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against them.
Cursed targets also gain a guaranteed critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} on their next attack.

Any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by this creature curses the targets, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against them.
Cursed targets also gain a guaranteed critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} on their next attack.

languages.text:
此生物造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会诅咒目标，被诅咒的目标更容易承受{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
不过，被诅咒的目标下次进行攻击时，也同样必定会造成暴击。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by this creature curses the targets, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against them.
Cursed targets also gain a guaranteed critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} on their next attack.

traits.locale_text:
此生物造成的所有伤害都会诅咒目标，被诅咒的目标更容易承受暴击。{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}{/g}
此外，被诅咒的目标下次受到攻击时必定会承受{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击{/g}。

languages.text:
Нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, существо проклинает цель, увеличивая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} по ней.
Следующее {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, совершенное проклятой целью, гарантированно станет критическим.
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by this creature curses the targets, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against them.
Cursed targets also gain a guaranteed critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} on their next attack.

traits.locale_text:
Нанося урон, существо проклинает цель, увеличивая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}шанс критического попадания{/g} по ней.
Следующее попадание, совершенное проклятой целью, гарантированно станет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическим{/g}.

Нанося урон, существо проклинает цель, увеличивая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}шанс критического попадания{/g} по ней.
Следующее попадание, совершенное проклятой целью, гарантированно станет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическим{/g}.

languages.text:
この生物が与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、すべてターゲットを呪い、そのターゲットに対する{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}率を増加させる。
呪いをかけられたターゲットは、次の攻撃で確実にクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by this creature curses the targets, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against them.
Cursed targets also gain a guaranteed critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} on their next attack.

traits.locale_text:
この生物が与えるダメージはすべてターゲットを呪い、そのターゲットに対する{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット{/g}率を増加させる。
呪いをかけられたターゲットは、次の攻撃で確実に{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット{/g}を得る。

languages.text:
Cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido por esta criatura maldice al objetivo, aumentando la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} contra él.
Los objetivos malditos también obtienen un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico en su siguiente ataque.
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by this creature curses the targets, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against them.
Cursed targets also gain a guaranteed critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} on their next attack.

traits.locale_text:
Cualquier daño infligido por esta criatura maldice al objetivo, aumentando la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}impacto crítico{/g} contra él.
Los objetivos malditos también obtienen un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}impacto crítico{/g} en su siguiente ataque.

languages.text:
Von dieser Kreatur verursachter {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verflucht Ziele und erhöht dabei die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} gegen sie.
Verfluchte Ziele erhalten außerdem einen garantierten kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} bei ihrem nächsten Angriff.
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by this creature curses the targets, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance against them.
Cursed targets also gain a guaranteed critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} on their next attack.

traits.locale_text:
Jeglicher von dieser Kreatur verursachte Schaden verflucht Ziele und erhöht dabei die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritische Treffer{/g}chance gegen sie.
Verfluchte Ziele erhalten außerdem einen garantierten {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Treffer{/g} bei ihrem nächsten Angriff.

languages.text:
Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par cette créature maudissent les cibles, ce qui augmente ses chances de leur infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.
Les cibles maudites bénéficient également d'un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique garanti pour leur attaque suivante.

Cursed targets also gain a guaranteed critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} on their next attack.

traits.locale_text:
Tous les dégâts infligés par cette créature maudissent les cibles, ce qui augmente ses chances de leur infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}coup critique{/g}.
Les cibles maudites bénéficient également d'un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}coup critique{/g} garanti pour leur attaque suivante.

languages.text:
Bu yaratığın verdiği her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, hedeflerini lanetleyerek onlara karşı {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} olasılığını artırır.
Bunun yanı sıra lanetlenen hedeflerin bir sonraki saldırısı, yüzde yüz olasılıkla kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} gerçekleştirir.
